lines.text: [first lines]
[after reading a sign that says "Trespassers Will Be Shot"]
Looks like folks ain't exactly welcome around here.
Well, I don't believe in signs.
Say, Dave, didn't you use to have another young one - a little girl with freckles and a pug nose?
He certainly has and I've always said such nice things about you.
Gosh, Nancy, you sure growed up in a hurry!
And pretty!
[Julie Jane tugs on Stony's shirt]
What is it, honey?
I think you're pretty, too.
So that's His Honor the Mayor. Brings his own jury.
Swell chance we're going to have.
We'll stick around and see how far this thing will go.
Just a minute! What kind of farce do you call this?
Don't you approve of the way we hold court?
This isn't a court, it's a three-ring circus.
Careful, young man...
Of what? You're sworn to uphold the laws of this territory and what do yo do? Jump like a rabbit every time he cracks a whip.
One more word from you and I'll fine you for contempt!
Word fail to express my contempt for this court.
Well, you've certainly made a hit with Billy and Julie.
I wish the rest of the family felt that way.
Give me a good reason why I should.
Oh, well, I'm kind to animals and help old ladies across the street.
That is, when there aren't any young ones to help.
The voice of experience.
You better hit the hay, Romeo. You and Dave got a long ride ahead of you tomorrow.
Where?
We're taking the petition to Governor White.
Oh.
How about you going in my place tomorrow?

[looking at Nancy]
Oh, no. I'm going to stay here and watch the mine.
Well, be sure its the mine you look after.
Judge Hixon, the prisoner seems to want an early trial. Do you think you can accommodate him?
Well yes, Marshal, I think I can arrange it. I've done it before.
Oh, no, Judge. This is going to be a fair trial.
Just a minute, Brooke. You've been through a terrible ordeal. I can promise you that every man responsible will be punished before I'm through.
You're through right now.
Lullaby, what's holdin' you up? We gotta go!
It's not me, it's Elmer.
I don't want to ride in this roll. I'm no hot dog!
Shut up or I'll put mustard on your face.
I'll smother! I'll suffocate! In fact, I won't be able to breathe!
Can we depend on that?
